sub_fields.label: Calendar Embed Code
sub_fields.name: calendar_embed_code
sub_fields.instructions: Add the Calendar shortcode here. If you do not know what this means please contact Web Ok Solutions Inc.

sub_fields.label: Title
sub_fields.name: p_title
sub_fields.instructions: Add a title for the paragraph(s) below (Max 128 characters).

sub_fields.label: Paragraph(s)
sub_fields.name: p_content
sub_fields.instructions: Add content for the parapgrahs here. You can use the return key [enter] to create new paragraphs and the spacing will be added correctly on the website.

sub_fields.label: Subtitle
sub_fields.name: subtitle
sub_fields.instructions: Content that adds a little extra to the title (Max 64 characters).

sub_fields.label: Title
sub_fields.name: title
sub_fields.instructions: Add a catchy title. (Max 128 characters).

sub_fields.label: Paragraph?
sub_fields.name: content_toggle
sub_fields.instructions: You can chose to add a paragraph by toggling this to 'Yes'. By default this is turned off and toggled to 'No'.

sub_fields.label: Paragraph(s)
sub_fields.name: content
sub_fields.instructions: Add a paragraph or two here (max 1024 characters).

sub_fields.label: Link?
sub_fields.name: link_toggle
sub_fields.instructions: Toggle on a link that follows the paragraph(s). This link can either take a visitor to another page or it can allow them to download a file.

sub_fields.label: Page Link or File?
sub_fields.name: link_or_file
sub_fields.instructions: Choose between a page link or a file for this clickable link.

sub_fields.label: Image orientation
sub_fields.name: image_orientation
sub_fields.instructions: Choose if the image should be on the left to right of the content.

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: image
sub_fields.instructions: Add your image here.

sub_fields.label: Title
sub_fields.name: title
sub_fields.instructions: Add a short title here (Max 64 characters).

sub_fields.label: Content
sub_fields.name: content
sub_fields.instructions: Add a short title here (Max 1,536 characters).

sub_fields.label: Image orientation
sub_fields.name: image_orientation
sub_fields.instructions: Choose if the image should be on the left to right of the content.

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: image
sub_fields.instructions: Add your image here.

sub_fields.label: Name
sub_fields.name: name
sub_fields.instructions: Add the person's name here (Max 32 characters).

sub_fields.label: Title
sub_fields.name: title
sub_fields.instructions: Add a short title here (Max 32 characters).

sub_fields.label: Focuses
sub_fields.name: focuses
sub_fields.instructions: Add this person's focuses or skills. Separate each with a pipe symbol. The pipe symbol is the all vertical line above or near the return key on your keyboard it looks like this: "|". Focuses are optional and can be left blank if that is desired.

sub_fields.label: Content
sub_fields.name: content
sub_fields.instructions: Add a short title here (Max 1024 characters).

sub_fields.label: Contact information?
sub_fields.name: contact_information_toggle
sub_fields.instructions: Add the person contact information if desired by toggling this section on.

sub_fields.label: Team title
sub_fields.name: team_title
sub_fields.instructions: Add a short title for team section (Max 32 characters).

sub_fields.label: Name
sub_fields.name: name
sub_fields.instructions: Add the team member's name here

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: image
sub_fields.instructions: Add a 1:1 ratio image of the person (square images work best).

sub_fields.label: Short bio
sub_fields.name: short_bio
sub_fields.instructions: Add a small informative sentence or two about this person (Max 72 characters).

sub_fields.label: Title
sub_fields.name: title
sub_fields.instructions: Add a short title prompting users to get in touch with you (Max 64 characters).

sub_fields.label: Content
sub_fields.name: content
sub_fields.instructions: Add a short call to action to prompt users to get in touch with you (Max 256 characters).

sub_fields.label: Border?
sub_fields.name: border_toggle
sub_fields.instructions: Toggle the top border of this row on or off.

sub_fields.label: Content Type?
sub_fields.name: content_type_left
sub_fields.instructions: Choose between a Title and Paragraph or a Title, Paragraph and List combination for the left side of this row.

sub_fields.label: Title
sub_fields.name: left_title
sub_fields.instructions: Add your title here(Max 128 characters).

sub_fields.label: Paragraph
sub_fields.name: paragraph
sub_fields.instructions: Add your paragraph here.

sub_fields.label: List Item
sub_fields.name: list_item
sub_fields.instructions: Add your list item here (Max 256 characters).

sub_fields.label: Content Type?
sub_fields.name: content_type_right
sub_fields.instructions: Choose between a Subtitle and Buttons or a Subtitle and List combination for the right side of this row.

sub_fields.label: Title
sub_fields.name: right_title
sub_fields.instructions: Add your title here(Max 64 characters).

sub_fields.label: Buttons
sub_fields.name: buttons
sub_fields.instructions: Add multiple buttons here.

sub_fields.label: Button
sub_fields.name: button_link
sub_fields.instructions: Add button details here and remember to chose a colour.

sub_fields.label: Single line of content
sub_fields.name: single_line_of_content
sub_fields.instructions: Add short description of what is to follow (Max 256 characters).

sub_fields.label: List Item
sub_fields.name: list_item
sub_fields.instructions: Add your list item here (Max 256 characters).

sub_fields.label: Section Title
sub_fields.name: section_title
sub_fields.instructions: Add a short title for the whole section on the page here (Max 32 characters).

sub_fields.label: Video
sub_fields.name: video
sub_fields.instructions: Add a video title and embed from YouTube here.

sub_fields.label: Title
sub_fields.name: title
sub_fields.instructions: Title content here (Max 64 characters).

sub_fields.label: Buttons
sub_fields.name: buttons
sub_fields.instructions: Add multiple buttons here.

sub_fields.label: Button
sub_fields.name: button_link
sub_fields.instructions: Add button details here and remember to chose a colour.

sub_fields.label: Content with form?
sub_fields.name: content_with_form
sub_fields.instructions: Toggle the title and description content on or off. This should be off if the form is the top row on the page.

sub_fields.label: Form title
sub_fields.name: form_title
sub_fields.instructions: Add a short title to the form here (Max 64 characters).

sub_fields.label: Form content
sub_fields.name: form_content
sub_fields.instructions: Add a short description to the form here (Max 128 characters).

sub_fields.label: Form embed
sub_fields.name: form_embed
sub_fields.instructions: Paste the shortcode from a contact form here. A shortcode looks like this: "[shortcode]". You can find these by selecting Contact in the left sidebar here in the backend of you website.

sub_fields.label: FAQs
sub_fields.name: faqs
sub_fields.instructions: Add all FAQs here. Use multiple FAQ components if you want to separate them into categories.

sub_fields.label: Question
sub_fields.name: question
sub_fields.instructions: FAQ question (Max 150 characters)

sub_fields.label: Answer
sub_fields.name: answer
sub_fields.instructions: FAQ Answer (Max 1500 Characters)

sub_fields.label: Services section title
sub_fields.name: services_section_title
sub_fields.instructions: Add a short title for the section here (Max 64 characters).

sub_fields.label: Services
sub_fields.name: services
sub_fields.instructions: Select the services you would like to show up on the Services page here.

sub_fields.label: Section button?
sub_fields.name: section_button_toggle
sub_fields.instructions: Add a button to the bottom of this section if want to direct users to a specific page.

sub_fields.label: No button
sub_fields.message: There is no button currently. That is ok, by default it is turned off.

sub_fields.label: Button
sub_fields.name: button_link
sub_fields.instructions: Select a page to direct the user to.

sub_fields.label: Upcoming events
sub_fields.message: By adding this row all upcoming events are automatically added to this page.

sub_fields.label: PayPal code
sub_fields.name: paypal_code
sub_fields.instructions: Paste your PayPal button code here.

sub_fields.label: Program/Workshop Cost
sub_fields.name: program_workshop_cost
sub_fields.instructions: Add the cost of the Program or Workshop.

sub_fields.label: Page message
sub_fields.name: page_message
sub_fields.instructions: Add a message here for the user to explain what they should be doing on this page.

sub_fields.label: Final steps.
sub_fields.message: Remember to Update this page once you have added the cost. The PayPal payment will then be added to this page.
